p
Class WaterSurface

java.lang.Object
  p.WaterSurface

 class WaterSurface
extends java.lang.Object

This class simulates the water surface which is basically a sin function.
The surface function is:
Amplitude*sin(phi+omega*x)

Author:
Andras Belicza

getSurfaceAngleAt

public double getSurfaceAngleAt(int x)
Returns the angle of the surface at a specified position.
The angle of surface is calculated by the derivated surface function. We know that the cos function gives the derivation of the sin. We gives this to an archus tangent function.

Parameters:
x - position where we want to know the angle of surface
Returns:
angle of the surface at the specified position
